sentences.english: This is to allow the juices to seep back into the meat and make it that bit more succulent.

sentences.english: The dish is usually served with a rich onion gravy.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜通常都和浓郁的洋葱肉汁一起食用。

sentences.english: She enriched the gravy with a little flour browned in butter.
sentences.chinese: 她用一些在黄油中炒过的面粉给肉汁调味。

sentences.english: Acquisition of fruit maturity, at any time from gravy and pericarps for use.

sentences.english: Put the hot broth in the refrigerator for an hour to hasten cooling.
sentences.chinese: 把肉汁在冰箱中放一小时以加快冷却。

sentences.english: Poutine is a messy, rich version of gravy fries in Canada.

sentences.english: Rich, thick gravies are either found in restaurants or prepared (rarely) during special occasions.

你不能叫这种东西肉汁吧？

sentences.english: Cook the meat quickly at first to seal in the juices.

sentences.english: I am convinced that the addition of this pinch of soda will definitely make the chicken juicier.

sentences.english: The chicken, the gravy, and even the rice all have monosodium glutamate added.
